dashboard.index.license.title: Lisensi Kirby
dashboard.index.license.text:
It seems you are running Kirby on a public server without a valid license!

Please, support Kirby and (link: {buy} text: buy a license now)

If you already have a license key, just add it to your config file: (link: {docs} text: site/config/config.php)
